| Resource  | List                                                         |
|-----------|--------------------------------------------------------------|
| rule:file | 0010-rules_config.xml 0015-wazuh_rules.xml local_rules.xml   |
|           | 0610-win-ms_logs_rules.xml 0620-win-generic_rules.xml ...    |

| Actions    | Resources | Allow                                      | Deny |
|------------|-----------|--------------------------------------------|------|
| rules:read | rule:file | 0010-rules_config.xml                      |      |
